text.9_Daf, 112_Line: Kings are only anointed by a spring, in order that their reign flow on, as it says
text.2_Daf, 3_Line: WHEN ONE HAS INTERCOURSE WITH A WOMAN AND HER DAUGHTER, WITH A MARRIED WOMAN,
text.11_Daf, 64_Line: Rabbi Chana bar Bizna said in the name of Rabbi Shimon Chasida,
text.2_Daf, 11_Line: AND [WHEN ONE TRANSGRESSES THE LAWS OF] THE PASCHAL OFFERING , AND CIRCUMCISION â€” FROM AMONG POSITIVE COMMANDMENTS.
text.2_Daf, 10_Line: WHEN ONE COMPOUNDS OIL [OF ANOINTING] OR COMPOUNDS INCENSE, OR USES [UNLAWFULLY] OIL OF ANOINTING;
text.2_Daf, 9_Line: WHEN ONE EATS ANYTHING LEAVENED ON PASSOVER; WHEN ONE EATS OR WORKS ON THE DAY OF ATONEMENT;
text.2_Daf, 15_Line: ALSO THE BLASPHEMER [IS AN EXCEPTION], FOR IT SAYS:
text.10_Daf, 1_Line: And this is not a [correct] matter, lest his spirit become weak [as a result] and his [fortune guided by his] constellation will become bad.
text.2_Daf, 8_Line: WHEN ONE SLAUGHTERS OR OFFERS UP [A CONSECRATED ANIMAL] OUTSIDE [THE TEMPLE PRECINCTS];
text.16_Daf, 42_Line: A resident sojourner is permitted to do work on Shabbat for himself like a Yisrael on his intermediary holiday time.
text.16_Daf, 44_Line: like a Yisrael on a High Holiday.
text.9_Daf, 115_Line: "That person that wants to know whether [his life] will extend through the year or not, should bring a candle during the ten days between Rosh Hashanah and Yom Kippur and suspend it in a room where the wind is not blowing. If its light (its flame) continues, he will know that he will take out the year.
text.11_Daf, 67_Line: "...And founded his consortium on the earth..."(Amos 9:6)
text.2_Daf, 12_Line: FOR THESE [TRANSGRESSIONS] ONE IS LIABLE TO EXTINCTION IF COMMITTED WILFULLY,27 AND IF IN ERROR TO A SIN-OFFERING, AND IF THERE IS A DOUBT WHETHER HE HAD COMMITTED THE TRANSGRESSION TO A SUSPENSIVE GUILT-OFFERING,
text.2_Daf, 2_Line: WHEN A MAN HAS CONNECTION WITH A MALE, OR COVERS A BEAST, OR WHEN A WOMAN ALLOWS HERSELF TO BE COVERED BY A BEAST;
text.2_Daf, 4_Line: WITH HIS SISTER, WITH HIS FATHER'S SISTER, HIS MOTHER'S SISTER, HIS WIFE'S SISTER, HIS BROTHER'S WIFE, THE WIFE OF HIS FATHER'S BROTHER, OR WITH A MENSTRUOUS WOMAN;
text.2_Daf, 6_Line: WHEN AN UNCLEAN PERSON EATS OF SACRIFICIAL FOOD, OR WHEN ONE ENTERS THE PRECINCTS OF THE TEMPLE IN AN UNCLEAN STATE;
text.2_Daf, 13_Line: EXCEPT IN THE CASE OF ONE WHO DEFILED THE TEMPLE OR ITS CONSECRATED THINGS, SINCE ONE IS LIABLE IN THIS CASE TO A SLIDING-SCALE SACRIFICE. THUS R. MEIR,
text.11_Daf, 65_Line: Any fast that doesn't include the sinners of Israel is not a true fast. For behold galbanum has a foul smell and yet the Scripture counts it among the ingredients of incense.
text.2_Daf, 5_Line: WHEN ONE BLASPHEMES [THE LORD]. SERVES IDOLS, DEDICATES OF HIS CHILDREN TO MOLECH OR HAS A FAMILIAR SPIRIT, OR DESECRATES THE SABBATH;.
text.10_Daf, 3_Line: "Now that you have said that a sign is a [correct] matter, a man should accustom himself to eating squash, beans, leeks, beets and dates on Rosh Hashanah."
text.9_Daf, 116_Line: And a person that wants to conduct a business deal and wants to  know if the deal will be a successful one or not, should feed a chicken. If it becomes fat and beautiful, he will know that it will be successful.
text.2_Daf, 16_Line: YE SHALL HAVE ONE LAW FOR HIM THAT DOETH AUGHT IN ERROR;(Numbers 15:29) THIS IS TO EXCLUDE THE BLASPHEMER WHO PERFORMS NO ACTION.
text.9_Daf, 117_Line: That person that wants to go on a journey and wants to know if he will return to his home, should go out and stand in a partially darkened room. If he sees

text.2_Daf, 0_Line: [Mishnah]  THERE ARE IN THE TORAH THIRTY-SIX [TRANSGRESSIONS WHICH ARE PUNISHABLE WITH] EXTINCTION:
